item.content:encoded: The US Govt recommends against using Internet Explorer. Will people listen? Nope. But when they raise the terror threat warning, people buy duct tape. Go figure. Use Firefox or Mozilla. Not only are they more standards-compliant, less buggy, have more capabilities such as pop-up-blocking and tabbed-browsing, and faster than IE, they're safer. But I have noticed that IE has dropped from ~92% marketshare on Recipezaar to 85% in the last several months. Maybe one day we can stop working around the bugs in IE.
